Meet the HAA Mandate with MASCO Service
Meeting the HAA Mandate is now easier with Honeywell’s Sky Connect® Tracker III, which is the heart of the fleet operator’s mission management system. It is one of the most reliable systems that meets flight data monitoring (FDM) compliance for Helicopter Air Ambulance operators.
Sky Connect Tracker III’s satellite connectivity offers assured communications on every flight, with dual channels that enable simultaneous tracking and voice capabilities. Plus, for current Tracker II customers, the Tracker III fits the existing tray with minimal to no changes to the wiring and antennas.
Learn more about the benefits of upgrading to the Sky Connect Tracker III with MASCO Service in time to meet the April 23, 2018 HAA Mandate deadline!
